name: HashSet creation
prompt:
Add a public function called UniqueCount to Collections.calr that creates a HashSet of integers, adds some values (including duplicates), and returns the unique count. The function takes no parameters and returns i32.

Use this exact Calor HashSet syntax:
§F{f001:UniqueCount:pub}
  §O{i32}
  §HSET{nums:i32}
  §ADD{nums} 1
  §ADD{nums} 2
  §ADD{nums} 2
  §ADD{nums} 3
  §ADD{nums} 3
  §ADD{nums} 3
  §R §CNT{nums}
§/F{f001}

The HashSet syntax:
- §HSET{id:type} creates a new HashSet<type>
- §ADD{id} value adds a value (duplicates ignored)
- §CNT{id} returns the count of unique items
